title: The Beginning
description: Founded by a group of passionate coders on the C64. Started with cracktros and simple demos, quickly gaining respect in the early demoscene.

title: Breakthrough
description: Released "Digital Dreams" - our breakthrough demo featuring advanced raster effects and original SID music. Established Dexion as a major C64 crew.

title: C64 Mastery
description: Peak of our C64 era. Released "Plasma Storm" and other technical masterpieces, pushing the 64 to its absolute limits with innovative coding techniques.

title: Amiga Transition
description: Expanded to Amiga platform while maintaining C64 releases. "Copper Madness" showcased our mastery of the Copper coprocessor and brought international attention.

title: Golden Years
description: Peak of our creativity on Amiga. Released multiple award-winning demos including "Beyond Reality" and "Liquid Dreams". Collaborated with legendary musicians.

title: Innovation
description: Pioneered new techniques: texture mapping on Amiga, advanced plasma effects, and synchronized demo-music transitions. Released "Nexus".

title: Final Release
description: Released our swan song "Farewell to Silicon" - a tribute to the machines and community that shaped us. Members moved to PC and professional careers.
